meta.site_name: Jackelin Herrera Front End Developer â€” Portfolio

work.name: Cascade Engineering
work.description: On this project I lead the front-end development process from kick-off to final QA. I collaborated with our director of development and a third-party designer to bring to life a robust Drupal 7 site. The requirements were out of the scope of a traditional Drupal site but with the help of Drupal's contrib modules: Entity and Paragraphs, we built a highly flexible site where content administrator's can easily compose web pages in different layouts, not constrained to a fixed template. During the process, I defined front-end build tools and established new techniques to solve challenges and allow for pivots along the way.
work.build_tools: Grunt, Bower, SASS, Bourbon, Vagrant, Drush, Features(module), Git

work.name: IDL Worldwide
work.description: Praised to be one of Symmetri's most successful development projects; this was the first project I worked with the Commercial Progression team, after the Symmetri/Commerical Progression merger. The project was completed under estimated budget and ahead of deadline. The site was built in Drupal 7 using Zurb Foundation sub-theme. I gathered development requirements and collaborated with our account directors and third-party designer.
work.build_tools: Grunt, Bower, SASS, Zurb Foundation, Vagrant, Drush, Features(module), Git

work.name: Crown Cork
work.description: Crown Cork is a project I worked on with several Drupal and front-end developers in an agile process which included lead designers, account coordinators and UX specialists. In March 2017, I was brought back on to work on redesign changes to the homepage.
work.build_tools: SASS, Compass, Zurb Foundation, Drush, MAMP, Git

work.name: Single-Unit Restorations
work.description: Based on client requirements, Single-Unit Restorations is a cloned and redesigned version of their product site class2restorations. As the lead developer, I was responsible for the front-end experience and development overhaul, where I worked closely with our account supervisors to ensure a timely launch.

work.name: Runzheimer
work.description: This project was initiated, designed and built in-house. I worked closely with creatives, the account team and developers to coordinate requirements and create functional specifications. Runzheimer was in Drupal 7 using a custom theme, integrated with Marketo CRM.

work.name: Chicago Symphony Orchestra
work.description: Adage Technologies partnered with Sandstorm Design to redo the front-end code of the CSO .NET website. I was chosen, along with a Sandstorm web developer to collaborate with the Adage team and meet weekly code deliverables while maintaining strict code standards.

work.name: Calibra Cement
work.description: The Calibra Cement selection tool was created to guide users into choosing the right product that fits their needs. I was responsible for the build and implementation of the selection tool's custom solution with Javascript.

work.name: Brandimage
work.description: Brandimage is a highly customized Drupal 7 build where I collaborated with third party designers and developers to bring to life an elegant multi-language portfolio site using Isotope JS.

work.name: Schawk
work.description: Schawk, one of Symmetri's biggest client's, underwent a full site enhancement. I led the front-end redesign process and contributed with the multi-language variant development.

work.name: SGK
work.description: Along with Schawk, SGK underwent a site enhancement where the homepage and many landing pages were redesigned and developed. I was responsible for all the front-end enhancements, while building over legacy code.

work.name: Vibrant Credit Union
work.description: I worked alongside a Drupal developer to build Vibrant in Drupal 7 using a custom theme.
